Summary: Two star like objects, one was brighter then the other.
divs: Sighting DetailsTwo star like objects. One was brighter then the other and not moving at all. While watching from outside four differant helicopters circled around them and then flew off. I went back inside and came back out about 10 min later and the objects were gone.
trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Mesa
There were no other sightings in Mesa on or around March 11th 2012
